Name: Operator
About the game: Important post! Please read this by clicking here before purchasing!!! Taking inspiration from both Mark J. Hadley's (Agent Parsec) 'Slender: The Eight Pages' and Dknighter's 'Phasmophobia,' Operator combines the psychological horror and thrill of Slender: The Eight Pages with an interactive voice component affected by the game itself. Explore the forest as you collect 8 manuscripts in an effort to slowly piece together the mystery of a disappearance. However, be wearying of an unknown entity lurking in the trees, with it's mere presence distorting your gaze... Join our Discord for updates regarding new content, server status, and the latest patches in development!
